title: The Dan Bongino Sunday Special 05/01/22
description:
First up today we talked with Dinesh D’Souza about his critically important new movie 2000 Mules. Next we talk with Hans Von Spakovsky, who knows more about elections than anyone, about this frightening plan Joe Biden has for mobilizing the federal government for voter registration. Finally we spoke with Santa Rosa County, Florida Sheriff Bob Johnson, who went viral last week with a video telling residents its okay to defend yourself if someone breaks into your home.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
